scripts.bump:patch:lib: npm version patch --force && cd projects/ng-partial-loader && npm version patch --force && cd ../../
scripts.bump:minor:lib: npm version minor --force && cd projects/ng-partial-loader && npm version minor --force && cd ../../
scripts.bump:major:lib: npm version major --force && cd projects/ng-partial-loader && npm version major --force && cd ../../
scripts.build:patch:lib: npm run bump:patch:lib && ng build ng-partial-loader
scripts.build:minor:lib: npm run bump:minor:lib && ng build ng-partial-loader
scripts.build:major:lib: npm run bump:major:lib && ng build ng-partial-loader
scripts.release: npm run npm:pack && cd dist/ng-partial-loader && npm publish
scripts.package:patch:lib: npm run lint:lib && npm run build:patch:lib && npm run release
scripts.package:minor:lib: npm run lint:lib && npm run build:minor:lib && npm run release
scripts.package:major:lib: npm run lint:lib && npm run build:major:lib && npm run release
